ca.uqac.dim.mapreduce.InCollector Interface Reference

Data source used as the input of the map and reduce phases. More...

Inheritance diagram for ca.uqac.dim.mapreduce.InCollector:

List of all members.

Public Member Functions

int count ()
 Count the number of tuples in the collector.

Detailed Description

Data source used as the input of the map and reduce phases.

An InCollector can be used to enumerate data tuples using the hasNext and next methods, like an Iterator.

Author:
Sylvain Hall√©
Version:
1.0

Member Function Documentation

int ca.uqac.dim.mapreduce.InCollector.count ( )

Count the number of tuples in the collector.

Returns:
The number of tuples. A Collector for which the size cannot be computed should return -1.

Implemented in ca.uqac.dim.mapreduce.Collector.
